rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.vastu_note: Positioned in the north-east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.vastu_note: Ensuring central placement aligning with the main entrance and courtyard.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.vastu_note: Serves as a connector between social spaces.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.vastu_note: Placed in the south-east to harness energies of prosperity and health. Ensure natural light from east window.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.vastu_note: Positioned on the north side to promote calmness and restfulness; includes south-east corner for wealth.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.vastu_note: Placed in a quiet corner with access to natural light from east window.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.vastu_note: Ensuring privacy while aligning with Vastu principles for health and balance.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.vastu_note: Placed towards the west to accommodate occasional visitors, ensuring ample natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.vastu_note: Integrated within a quiet zone with access to eastern sunlight for balance.
